channel.title: Doom Magic - devoid of joy
channel.description:
In the shadows of the moonlight the elder phantoms were brought forth to perform the dark arts of the ancient ones. From their eternal slumber they awaken shrouded in the dusts of entropy to bring the secret incantations of cataclysms. They chant in numerous dead languages to bring about the annihilation of man and his goals of power over the dirt in which he stands and DOOM him to lie beneath the souls for eternity in silence. a MAGIC meant to gift eternal silence and darkness.
https://soundcloud.com/devoidofjoy/doom-magic ![6D8E13D8-1D01-4750-A07A-1F6F51BB07C4|375x500](upload://60KEy1mtdKtJvfE6LtbiyjRLmlj.jpeg)
